title: Ride Hard
description: Eric Jesson is the new president of the Black's Raiders motorcycle club. Lexi is the daughter of an original member who hates Eric like crazy.  Is Lexi more afraid of her father, or of missing out on love?  EXCERPT:   “I’m coming, I’m coming,” I yelled, and pulled on a bathrobe over my pajamas before opening the door.  “Glad you finally decided to grace us with your presence, you lazy little whore,” my father said.  I didn’t roll my eyes, even though I wanted to. I was running out of makeup.
author: Sarah Sorana
